Class BaseVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.variables.BaseVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVariable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckVariable, CommentVariable, ListVariable, MultilineStringVariable, StringVariable

    public abstract class BaseVariable
extends Object
implements IVariable
    The base class for the variable definition.
